entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries or rain showers. Temperature rising to plus 3 this evening then falling.
entry.summary: A few flurries changing to a few rain showers near midnight. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Rainfall amount 2 mm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Temperature rising to plus 3 this evening then falling. Wind chill minus 10 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. 30 percent chance of rain showers late in the afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Cloudy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast late in the evening and overnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 05 February 2023
